      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void acceptRequest(boolean accept)
      On accept = true, updates record for this contact in profile table setting accepted to 1 On accept = false, deletes this contact's entry from profile table and closes chat window.

      Gets the profile email.

      private void send(java.lang.String text)
      Generates the unique ID for this message then attaches the file if file to attach is selected by calling upload and finally send calls sendMessage to send message.
      private void sendMessage(java.lang.String messageId, java.lang.String text, java.lang.String uploadedUrl)
      Construct and send message (a Message object) to server in json format.
      private void upload(java.lang.String messageId, java.lang.String text)
      Uploads a file to GAE server in separate thread and on successful upload calls sendMessage along with text and URL to attachment to send chat message.
